keyMoments.title: Awakens to Save Nami
keyMoments.description: Sanji wakes up in shock, realizing Nami is in grave danger aboard Enel's ship and immediately plans her rescue despite knowing Enel's overwhelming power.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's unwavering protective instinct and devotion to his crew.

keyMoments.title: Strategic Split Decision
keyMoments.description: Sanji decides to split up from Usopp to maximize rescue chances and covertly sabotage the Ark Maxim's systems.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's tactical intelligence and ability to think strategically even in desperate situations.

keyMoments.title: Heroic Sacrifice for Crew
keyMoments.description: Sanji kicks Usopp to safety and takes the full force of Enel's God's Judgment attack, one of the most powerful lightning strikes in the series.
keyMoments.significance: One of Sanji's most heroic moments, demonstrating his willingness to die for his crewmates. Shows his care extends beyond just Nami to all crew members.

keyMoments.title: Iconic 'I Needed a Light' Moment
keyMoments.description: After being struck by God's Judgment, Sanji remains standing, smokes a cigarette lit by the lightning, and delivers his legendary line: 'Thanks... I was just about to ask for a light. Yeah... you'll pay for this.'
keyMoments.significance: Arguably Sanji's most iconic moment in the entire series. Demonstrates his unbreakable spirit, cool demeanor under pressure, and defiant nature. This scene has become legendary in the One Piece community.

keyMoments.title: Sabotage of the Ark Maxim Revealed
keyMoments.description: After Sanji collapses, it's revealed he sabotaged the Ark Maxim's systems during his infiltration, causing malfunctions that will hinder Enel's plans.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Sanji's strategic thinking and ability to multitask - even while focused on rescuing Nami, he thought ahead to damage Enel's greater scheme.

relationships.description: Sanji risks his life to rescue Nami from Enel, showing his deep protective feelings and willingness to sacrifice everything for her safety.
Sanji works with Usopp on the rescue mission and ultimately saves his life along with Nami's, demonstrating his care for all crewmates.
Sanji directly confronts Enel, taking his devastating attack and sabotaging his ship, establishing himself as a thorn in the god's plans.

keyMoments.title: Climbs to the Ark Maxim Despite Fear
keyMoments.description: Despite his terror of Enel's power and the extreme height, Usopp climbs to the Ark Maxim with Sanji to rescue Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's growth in courage, as he participates in a dangerous mission despite his cowardice.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Spell Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Usopp attempts a new psychological attack technique where the target must think about needles under their fingernails. The technique comically fails to affect Enel but works on Nami instead.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's creative approach to combat and his tendency to develop unique, if often ineffective, techniques.

keyMoments.title: Reaches Nami First
keyMoments.description: Usopp is the first to reach Nami on the deck and attempts to rescue her using the Waver.
keyMoments.significance: Despite his fear, Usopp takes the lead in the rescue attempt, showing his ability to act when it matters most.

abilities.name: Usopp Spell
abilities.description: A technique where Usopp tries to make the target think about painful imagery (needles under fingernails) to distract or weaken them mentally. Also called 'Usopp Voodoo' in the English dub.

relationships.description: Usopp partners with Sanji on the rescue mission. Sanji ultimately saves Usopp's life by taking Enel's attack.
Usopp risks his life to rescue Nami from Enel, showing his loyalty to his crew despite his fear.

keyMoments.title: Strategic Use of Thunder Ball
keyMoments.description: Nami demonstrates tactical use of her Clima-Tact's Thunder Ball ability to redirect Enel's lightning attacks away from herself.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's growing combat intelligence and her ability to use weather knowledge against even a lightning-based opponent.

keyMoments.title: Guardian of Luffy's Straw Hat
keyMoments.description: Nami has Luffy's precious straw hat after he was thrown off the ship by Enel, keeping it safe for her captain.
keyMoments.significance: Symbolizes Nami's role in protecting what's precious to the crew and her deep bond with Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Sanji's Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Nami successfully escapes the Ark Maxim with Usopp thanks to Sanji taking the devastating attack meant for them.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's willingness to sacrifice for each other and deepens Nami's bond with Sanji.

relationships.description: Sanji risks everything to rescue Nami, taking a potentially fatal attack to ensure her escape. Nami shows genuine concern and gratitude for his sacrifice.
Nami protects Luffy's straw hat after he's defeated, showing her role as someone who carries on when the captain falls.

keyMoments.title: Detects Intruders with Mantra
keyMoments.description: Enel casually detects Sanji and Usopp infiltrating his ship using his Mantra (Observation Haki), calling them 'rats' who've snuck aboard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Enel's overwhelming advantage with his Haki abilities and his god complex in how he dismissively refers to the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Unleashes God's Judgment
keyMoments.description: Enel unleashes one of his most powerful attacks, God's Judgment, a massive lightning bolt designed to kill Usopp and Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Enel's ruthlessness and willingness to kill without hesitation. The attack's power level establishes the deadly threat he poses.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Ship Sabotage
keyMoments.description: Enel realizes with frustration that Sanji has sabotaged the Ark Maxim's systems, causing malfunctions throughout the ship.
keyMoments.significance: This is one of the first times Enel loses his composure, showing he can be outsmarted despite his overwhelming power.

abilities.name: God's Judgment
abilities.description: A massive lightning bolt attack with devastating destructive power, capable of instantly killing most opponents.

abilities.name: Mantra
abilities.description: Observation Haki that allows Enel to detect people's presence and predict their movements, making stealth impossible against him.

relationships.description: Sanji sabotages Enel's ship and takes his powerful attack, establishing himself as a significant thorn in Enel's plans and earning the god's anger.
Enel holds Nami captive aboard his ship and attempts to kill her, seeing her as a useful navigator but ultimately expendable.

keyMoments.title: Rescues Injured Warriors in Shandora
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi abilities to carry the wounded bodies of Zoro, Wyper, and others near Giant Jack in the ruins of Shandora.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's integration with the crew and her willingness to help protect and save others, showing her character growth from a solitary survivor to a caring crew member.
